item.description:
Live each day with thanksgiving and appreciation. Make this a daily event more than a yearly event. Focus on what is good - including all the abundance we forget to notice. Attention, gratitude and love enhance this attitude, open your heart and attract more. Herb's practical tips, ideas and actions will bring this into the forefront of your daily awareness.

Optional fabulous macrobiotic meal from 7 to 8:30pm, additional $20

8:30-10pm, $30-15


Herb Pearce, M.Ed, has led relationship courses for over 30 years and also is a personality types expert with a focus on relationship dynamics with over 20 years experience teaching the Enneagram nationwide. He is the author of the Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram, is an individual, couples and family therapist and also does phone sessions (including typing people by phone) using the Enneagram and Myers Briggs as tools for relationship healing and personal growth.

Send your email to get Herb's weekly email newsletter with Herb's Life Tips.

herb@herbpearce.com
www.herbpearce.com
781 648 3737
item.name: Live Each Day with Praise and Thanksgiving
